title: 272: CHATTY BROS: Katie’s Bachelorette Ep 2 & 3 Recap!
itunes:title: 272: CHATTY BROS: Katie’s Bachelorette Ep 2 & 3 Recap!
description:
Grayston and Evan and here to chat about their thoughts on the 2nd and 3rd episode of Katie’s season of The Bachelorette! They discuss Mike’s letter, missing Karl, Aaron and Cody, their love for “villains”, their continued love for Katie, thoughts on how far Michael will go, Greg, Nick’s circle, and a lot more! 

 

FOLLOW THE CHATTY BROS HERE:

 Grayston: https://www.instagram.com/pipyopi/

Evan: https://www.instagram.com/trippersounds/
